item.description:
Hello and Happy New Year to all our new bully enthusiats and old friends!

Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow! Does your bully love this weather? Can you grin and bear it? Then bring your friendly bully to the Sharon Dog Park on Saturday, January 30th at 11:00a for a chilly, fun-filled snow day with our outstanding breed ambassadors!

Also, the NEBBC will be holding a meeting Sunday, February 7th at 7:00p at Uno's in Bellingham, MA (take 495 to exit 18). Please come to share your ideas for the new year! We need all the help we can get... the more committed people we have, the more we can accomplish in 2010!

Looking forward to meeting you!

Cassie-Leigh Stock
President
New England Bully Breed Club
www.newenglandbullybreedclub.com
item.name: Sharon Dog Park Meet-Up in the Snow!
